originalText.text:
If their tool was any good, they wouldn't need such an aggressive sales team that won't leave you alone after telling them multiple times.

Amazing the an SEO tool has such bad content marketing. Compare to SemRush or Ahrefs...

originalText.text: This is the modern open workplace of this innovative company. My cousin and I were given the tour of the various work areas to promote interaction among the employees, who were very nice and friendly, especially the dog Lucy. Our guide was Andrew, who was very knowledgable about the functions of his company. A relaxed work environment is evident, with video games and a healthy snack bar area, so the workers can be more productive. An interesting concept to me, working in military type structured environments most of my career. All in all, a great education in the workplace of the future, and thanks to the staff at Conductor,  they seem very committed to helping their clients prosper with their unique  internet marketing strategy.

originalText.text: The absolutely best technology for anyone who cares about their company's web presence, from search engine optimization in organic search results to content to social media marketing. All organizations big and small need Conductor's Searchlight platform for their organization, not just for the SEOs and content creators, but throughout the marketing team and anyone who cares about how a company's web presence impacts the bottom line.

originalText.text:
Winner of the MarTech 2019 Best SEO Tool, Conductor is the leading software for SEO, content creation, analytics and more.
They make SEO accessible to everyone by integrating Google Analytics and other data from SEM Rush into an easy, customizable and user friendly format.
The insights let you measure ROI for your ORGANIC PRESENCE, as well as see how you compare to your competitors.
Unparalleled team, customer service and product.

text.text:

The insights let you measure ROI for your ORGANIC PRESENCE, as well as see how you compare to your competitors.
Unparalleled team, customer service and product.

originalText.text:
I've been a client of Conductor since the beginning of 2014 and have been thoroughly satisfied with the vast amount of data it provides me with about our paid and organic search marketing accounts.  In just a matter of weeks, we made some key decisions based on the information we received that resulted in our average cost per click decreasing by over 50%, while improving the number of paid leads we received on a weekly basis.  We've also built new content in the form of whitepapers, videos and blog posts around phrases that we wouldn't have had knowledge about without the use of Content Insights.

My account manager, Kevin Blake, has also been top-notch since the initial setup of our campaign and is always there to hop on a call to answer any questions I have.

I absolutely recommend Conductor to any web marketer or firm in the market for a best-in-class platform to manage, track, and grow your overall online marketing program.
